MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a fault with the power in the G73 postcode area of Rutherglen. This is causing flickering supply to a number of properties. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 4.28pm. Our engineers are on their way to the local area and our team will work to get your power back to normal as quickly and as safely as possible by 9.00pm. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6:28pm on Wednesday, 13 January 2021
